Plummet2

This game is so damn addictive. You've been WARNED!

Simply tap screen to control couple paddles, make them collide with matching black and white colors. Wrong collision makes you fail your progress. The board will be rotated after each 5 points you get, more challenging gameplay then?! Now, show us your high score by sharing the game. How many can you get?
